Campus Life








Main Content Region



Campus Life


















Get Involved
There are numerous way for students to get involved on campus. Below you will find multiple links and resources available to you.

Associate Students, Inc.
CSUSB Athletics
The Den – CSUSB Food Pantry
Events Calendar
Recreation and Wellness
Housing & Residential Life
Performing Arts
Santos Manuel Student Union
Student Employment / Internships
Student Engagement, Office of
Student Health Center
Theatre Arts
















Music and Arts
CSUSB is dedicated to excellence in the Arts showcasing our talented students, faculty and staff at our campuses in San Bernardino and Palm Desert.

Coyote Radio
Indian Wells Theater
Music Department
Performing Ensembles
Robert & Frances Fullerton Museum of Art
Theatre Arts















Housing and Residential Education
Residence halls provide a unique living environment where all of your neighbors are students just like you. We are proud to offer a dining program complete with signature brands and menu selections that entail just about every item you can imagine.

Arrowhead Village
Campus Dining Map
Campus Dining Services
Coyote Village
Housing & Residential Education
Serrano Village
University Village
















Recreation and Wellness
We are proud to offer you a range of opportunities to enhance your physical fitness, learn new skills, engage in friendly sports competition, expand your knowledge base, and to simply enjoy yourself.

Aquatics
Adventure (previously Outdoors)
Climbing Wall
Fitness & Wellness
Intramurals
Leadership Challenge Center
PDC Fitness Center
Recreation and Wellness
Sport Clubs















Student Health and Safety
At CSUSB, your health and safety is a top priority. As a reminder, be responsible, stay vigilant and attentive to what’s going on around you at all times. Remember that Coyotes respect the pack!

Campus Escort Services
Campus Evacuation Map
Campus Police

Emergency Management Plan
